html:
11.3.19  1:58 am   I can only play musical instruments by ear. I can't read or write. Does that mean I'm illiterate in music?

     FLUENT for sure, which might be an advantage over quite a few people who can read but can't listen. i would even say their literacy doesn't count unless they have the fluency that you have

11.3.19  1:57 am   I like your website?

     i am making it better

11.3.19  1:13 am   this may be annoying since it is not a question but you are awesome!! i appreciate your work and it has really brought me happiness. have a good day/night and i hope learning the new software is going well

     i am lost in the jungle but it's ok, i've made friends with most of the giant poisonous animals that are here. unless they ate me

11.3.19  1:44 am   Whats this big project your working on?

     what's a project

     start by explaining the things

     blackbird is good but that is extremely only 1 of the persons in the beatles

     i have no idea

     because it was named by people who were on the not-water part

     sure, i am looking forward to it

     it takes time to make use of it

     try to get as old as you possibly can

11.2.19  11:57 pm   what are your opinions on people transcribing your music to piano sheet music and then selling it for profit?

     that seems illegal

11.2.19  11:54 pm   How to analyze music?

     you just have to try to explain what you heard, in any way you can

11.2.19  11:51 pm   do you think there's other life in the universe?

     every life, i think .......

      and if yes, do you think it's more evolved than us, or less evolved?

     probably every evolvement level, but i just realized if you evolve enough you start evolving faster which makes you evolve faster, so i guess it would be only a matter of moments then until you either figure out how to leave the universe, change the universe, break the universe, or even make the universe

11.2.19  11:39 pm   been listening to a lot of sounds recently, should i try music next \n

     sure

11.2.19  11:30 pm   whats the best way to curl up with a song

     you'll probably want wireless headphones, to avoid tangles

11.2.19  11:23 pm   why do you talk weird in the second verse of it's gonna be alright

     talking is weird. there's just no getting around that. but i would call that singing, which is also weird by the way

     how about a bowl of cereal between 2 slices of bread

     i think singing a song would probably help

     barely

11.2.19  9:18 pm   Where do I go if I'm feeling stuck?

     outside

     do questions, then spend the rest of the day trying to re-invent the television

11.2.19  8:55 pm   Whats the best kind of science?

     mad

11.2.19  8:09 pm   how to deal when you already haven't been productive for the first hour(s) of the day and feel like you will never get anything done at this point?

     take the mental note you already made to yourself about how important it is to start the day good, and edit that note to say that it's even more important than you previously said it was

11.2.19  7:34 pm   do you prefer match grip or traditional grip in drumming?

     traditional

     you have to either use wings or explosions, or both

     sometimes i realize i already am

     i am only learning now just what a project can be

      Sorry for the serious question.

11.2.19  6:21 pm   How do you earn money outside of YouTube?

     spotify, itunes, paypal, patreon, google music, amazon, pandora, and from oil reserves off the coast of inner mongolia

     fair enough

     i'll see what i can do

11.2.19  4:56 pm   Do you prefer being asked serious questions or silly questions? Or do you not mind either way?

     seriousness is silly, and silliness is serious. that's why i like them both so much

     you will have to defeat the current president, Oprah Winfrey

11.2.19  1:16 pm   oh man, i think i might be stuck in some sort of loop where I keep (over)analysing the same thing again and again and again.
It's like as if I simultaneously know and don't know the answer to my question.
I've been doing tons of research regarding my question for months now, and I keep coming across the same answers..yet somehow I'm STILL not satisfied. It's like I need/want more.


Do you know a way out of this annoying loop? it's just draining me at this point...

     you're gonna have to tell me the question(s) if you want me to weigh in on it properly

11.2.19  12:50 pm   Have you ever messed around with microtonal music?

     if that means any pitch, then yes of course, especially when i'm speaking, however if it specifically means some kind of equal tempered non-12 system, then i am not interested whatsoever

     we'll see
